=head1 NAME

DBIx::Class::ResultSource::Table - Table object

=head1 SYNOPSIS

=head1 DESCRIPTION

Table object that inherits from L<DBIx::Class::ResultSource>.

=head1 METHODS

=head2 from

Returns the FROM entry for the table (i.e. the table name)
